name: BSOCIAL
description: BSOCIAL Token is a crypto asset developed by Bitci Borsa Teknoloji Anonim Limited on Bitcichain. BSocial Token ("BSCL") is a digital asset that aims to connect blockchain and users through the Bsocial.io media platform. BSocial Token aims to reward users' social interactions and participation on the Bsocial.io platform.
